thread.title: Patrick Stewart greeting his rescue dog is all sorts of adorable
thread.title_full: Patrick Stewart greeting his rescue dog is all sorts of adorable

author: Martha Tesema
title: Patrick Stewart greeting his rescue dog is all sorts of adorable

organizations.name: american society for the prevention of cruelty

text:
Sure, Patrick Stewart is adorable and anyone would be lucky enough to call him a friend . But a delighted Patrick Stewart greeting his new furry companion? That's whole new levels of endearing.
The actor teamed up with American Society for the Prevention of Cruelty to Animals (ASPCA) and Wags and Walks to adopt Ginger, a pitbull, and shared the sweetest video of their first interaction.
SEE ALSO: Patrick Stewart hints that Professor X could be appearing in 'Deadpool'
Thanks to @ASPCA and @WagsandWalks Sunny and I are finally fostering our 1st pitbull! Meet Ginger. I'm in LOVE. #AdoptDontShop pic.twitter.com/VQUBDvZhi9
â€” Patrick Stewart (@SirPatStew) March 8, 2017
"Oh there she is!," Stewart exclaimed as he peered out his window. "Look who's here. Wow. That's beautifulâ€”hi, love," he said before being smothered by dog kisses. "Thank you for that, that was a very nice greeting."
If your heart didn't melt watching the video, try watching it again. Stewart later tweeted an update, saying Ginger was "sleeping and snoring on our couch and I can honestly think of no greater compliment."
Our foster doggie Ginger is sleeping and snoring on our couch and I can honestly think of no greater compliment. @ASPCA @WagsandTails
â€” Patrick Stewart (@SirPatStew) March 9, 2017
In other Patrick Stewart/dog news of the day, this pup looks exactly like the actor.
When your dog looks like Patrick Stewart pic.twitter.com/MNgyK0BPpr
â€” Shaz ðŸŽ¶ (@sharonmar3) March 8, 2017
Big day for both dogs and Patrick Stewart.
